title: How strong is Wonder Woman's lasso? Who has been able to break and/or escape its tangle?

og.title: How strong is Wonder Woman's lasso? Who has been able to break and/or escape its tangle?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 3): The Lasso of Truth has proven to be quite durable. The only instance I can definitely state of it being snapped was by Bizarro in Batman/Superman/Wonder Woman: Trinity.

Bizarro’s contrary nature allows him to break free, though the reasoning behind it is worthy of a seminar.

It...
